results.name: RATS: Reverse Add Then Sort the digits applied to previous term, starting with 20169.
comment: A114613(1) = 20169 is the smallest starting number for a RATS trajectory leading to a cycle of length 3: A114611(20169) = 3;
link: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, RATS Sequence
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0, 0, 1).
